channel.title: strength on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in strength on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Introduction to the Indian Caste System
The Woman
item.description: She is the wind you cannot capture, the fire you cannot hold, She has the strength of the earth but she flows She is a woman.

item.title: What I learnt from my Grandmother
item.description: On Gandhi’s birthday I think of two people. One is my cousin who shares his birthday and the other is my maternal grandma who taught me most of what I know about Gandhian values.
